name: Palmy Regency

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: An excellent location - just could not be any better and more central, just a few minutes walk from the ferry station and the bus station. Unlike most of the other hotels located on an extremely congested and noisy central street, Palmy Regency is two minutes away from that street in a beautiful and very quiet alley. Just perfect!
reviews.title: Excellent place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There are a few Palmy's in Alleppey and we ended up at this one while trying to find the cheaper one (Rs 300 per night). Actually, this one worked out even better at only Rs 500 per night we had a huge room, comfy bed and a small TV. The rooms were very clean and there was also a generator which was handy due to the several powercuts a day.
reviews.title: Great place, great price!!!

reviews.text: It takes about 5 minutes to walk to the bus station and the main streets of the city are only another few minutes walk from there. To be honest, I didn't think there was that much worth seeing in Alleppey, like most people, we used it as a base while we found the best houseboat deal we could.
reviews.title: Excellent guest house with friendly people and clean rooms

reviews.text: My advice to you would be to book one night, spend as much time as you can pinning down the best houseboat deal and go out on your houseboat the next day. The Palmy actually have several houseboats, we headed out to see one of them but we didn't think it was worth the money so we ended up going with Venice Cruises - worth checking out.
reviews.title: better is hard to find

reviews.text: I stayed here for two nights, I found this guest house at the last minute when I arrived in Alleppey. The people who work here are so welcoming and friendly.
reviews.title: very good home stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had the room for 350 rupees a night with my own fan room and ensuite shower. There's no hot water and you don't need one anyways because the water is not that cold.
reviews.title: Fantastic place!

description: Best and cheapest homestay in Alleppey. Come stay @ palmy and feel the difference.
